thread_replies.author: Synth Potato
thread_replies.text:
CONTROL: RESONANT has just been announced by the absolute geniuses over at Remedy Studios

I absolutely adored Alan Wake 2 and I couldn't be more hyped to see what they do with this one, the graphics and art look insane.

Sam Lake is a genius, so let him cook!

Coming 2026

thread_replies.author: Geoff Keighley
thread_replies.text:
One of my The Game Awards rituals is to watch back the previous show.

This year, when I got to the Okami moment, I noticed my Dad was just over my shoulder in the audience, smiling.

As you may know, my dad passed away a few months ago. Tonight’s show is dedicated to him.

thread_replies.author: TheNCSmaster
thread_replies.text:
Okay Geoff does overhype way too many of the reveals he does

But this was completely valid for Okami 2
